Title: Relates to requirements for state programs to obtain federal financial supports for the implementation of a delivery system reform incentive payment program
Summary: Requires that any state program implemented pursuant to an agreement with the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services to obtain federal financial supports for the implementation of a delivery system reform incentive payment ("DSRIP") program shall require that a minimum of forty percent of all funds awarded pursuant to a state DSRIP program, shall be disbursed to community-based health care providers for specific programs and services.
LawCode: Amd ยง363-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requirements for certain state programs to obtain federal financial supports for the implementation of a delivery system reform incentive payment program
